CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( copado__Project__c )) , TEXT(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Platform__c) , IF( NOT(ISBLANK( copado__Release__c )), TEXT(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Platform__c) , 'Salesforce') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field auto-populates and displays the pipeline platform.
CustomField.label: Platform
